extension_description.message: Save and open all web pages with one click.

extension_subtitle.message: Simple To You, Complicated To Me

extension_feature1.message: Save and open all web pages with one click.

extension_feature2.message: Support search for bookmarks, history, tabs.

extension_feature3.message: You can easily adjust the behavior and style of the extension.

openCurrentWindowButNotSelect.message: Open in current window but not select

openCurrentWindowAndSelect.message: Open in current window and select

openTabWithoutSwitch.message: Open a new tab without switching

openTabAndSwitch.message: Open a new tab and switch

webRetry.message: Some pages have not been loaded, please try again later!

noResultTip.message: You can use spaces to separate multiple keywords to search.

windowDeleteConfirm.message: Are you sure to delete the window?

windowNameRepeat.message: The window name is not allowed to be repeated

windowNameEmpty.message: The window name is not allowed to be empty

windowNoResult.message: Please enter the window name first, and then click the "↓" button to save the window.

windowFirstAdd.message: The window is saved successfully. Clicking on the list will switch to the corresponding window. You can create a new window and save it so that you can see the effect.

windowCountTip.message: A total of [total] windows are stored.

noteCountTip.message: A total of [total] notes are stored.

temporaryCountTip.message: A total of [total] temporary windows are stored.

temporaryCloseTip.message: Tip: The tab will be closed after saving.

tabCountTip.message: A total of [total] tabs are opened.

bookmarkCountTip.message: A total of [total] bookmarks are stored.

historyDeleteConfirm.message: Are you sure to delete the history?

themeDeleteConfirm.message: Are you sure to delete the theme?

themeUpdateTip.message: This is a system theme, it cannot be modified, but it can be cloned.

themeNameUpdate.message: Click here to modify the theme name

noSearchTip.message: When the input box in the menu bar is empty, the number of items displayed in the list (only effective when "total height is automatic")

pageBlurTip.message: When transparent, it will be superimposed with the mask

smartSortingTip.message: The last visited workspace will be at the top of the category

listOrderTip1.message: Default: The contents of multiple workspaces will be displayed staggered according to the set number.

listOrderTip2.message: Top: It will appear at the very beginning and will continue until the end of the content. If there are multiple tops, they will be displayed in staggered fashion according to the set number.

listOrderTip3.message: Bottom: Only when the contents of the top and default workspaces are displayed, the output will start. If there are multiple bottoms, they will be displayed staggered according to the set number.

searchingNoMatchTip.message: Still showing in when not searching

searchEngineEnableTip.message: Appears only when there is no search content

searchURLTip.message: Perform a search on the website and copy the result URL, and replace the search keyword with {query}

searchEngineDeleteConfirm.message: Are you sure to delete the Search Engine?

restoreEngineDeleteConfirm.message: Are you sure to restore the default settings?

resetConfirm.message: Are you sure to restore the default configuration?

themeExportTip.message: Export all user themes (excluding system built-in themes)

adjustTip.message: Only in injection mode, and the pop-up window is effective.

thanksAlert.message: Thanks to the contributors of the open source project. It is the project you shared that allowed me to stand on the shoulders of giants and develop a product that I don't even think I can do in such a short time.

vueDescription1.message: Already know HTML, CSS and JavaScript? Read the guide and start building things in no time!

vueDescription2.message: An incrementally adoptable ecosystem that scales between a library and a full-featured framework.

vueDescription3.message: 20KB min+gzip Runtime | Blazing Fast Virtual DOM | Minimal Optimization Efforts

elementUIDescription.message: Element, a Vue 2.0 based component library for developers, designers and product managers

thanks1.message: Thank you to all users who use SaveTabs, you guys make my life more valuable.

thanks2.message: Thanks again to all users who share and support savetabs. It is you who have given it the driving force to move forward.

thanks3.message: Thanks for the encouragement and blessings of relatives and friends!

thanks4.message: Especially thank you dad and mom. In Guangzhou, what bothers me most is the problem of eating. As a Chaoshan person, I prefer to eat light food. Coupled with gastritis, it is not suitable to eat those greasy foods. So my parents have sent me my favorite pork, pork balls, and pork jerky many times from my hometown. This has solved my diet problem to a great extent, and under the care of these delicacies, my stomach It's already fine. Let’s share the photo of the box sent by my mother.

thanks5.message: Finally, one of my favorite songs

thanks6.message: DAN DAN 心魅かれてく (Dan Dan Kokoro Hikareteku)

switchToFarLeft.message: Switch to the far left (First Workspace)

switchToFarRight.message: Switch to the far right (Last Workspace)

workspaceDisabledTip.message: The [workspace] workspace has been disabled. Do you want to go to the Settings Center to open it?

leftAndRightEnabledTip.message: The left and right switching keymap is turned on.

leftAndRightDisabledTip.message: The left and right switching keymap has been disabled, but the following switching keymap  are still available.

noFocusTip.message: It can't get focus automatically. Please manually click the input box to enter the content.

zoomTip.message: Tip: The current webpage has been zoomed, and some operations may be abnormal.

onlyLastPopupTip.message: Only the last theme of the Popup type is left

onlyLastInjectTip.message: Only the last theme of the Inject type is left

undoConfirm.message: Are you sure to undo all changes?

blurTip.message: It is not currently supported to enable "Page Blur" and "Mask Blur" at the same time.

giveGoodComment.message: Give a good comment or suggestion

wechatSharingTip2.message: After opening the webpage, click on the upper right corner to share to Moments

advertisingTip.message: If you think this plug-in helps you, you can directly choose the goods you need to purchase, and the author will get some commission. Thank you for your support.

advertisingTip2.message: Click to view more product information.

advertisingTip3.message: Click to buy the product directly, thank you for your support!

advertisingTip4.message: Due to merchant promotions or other reasons, the price may change, please refer to the actual purchase price.

advertisingAlert1.message: These are the products that I have carefully selected from major platforms. I will get some commission after you buy them. Thank you for your support.

advertisingAlert2.message: Some more advanced functions will be added later in this plug-in, but this requires the purchase of an additional server. I hope someone can support it.

advertisingAlert3.message: Due to merchant promotions or other reasons, the price may change, please refer to the actual purchase price.

support1.message: If you think this plugin is good, you can buy me a cup of coffee. ￣▽￣

support3.message: to give praise or provide suggestions.

support5.message: to buy some goods, the author will get some commission, thank you for your support.

multipleSubmenuOpenTip.message: Multiple sub-menus can be expanded at the same time
